record.title: ORDERS FOR MONDAY, JULY 21, 2008
record.narrative:
ORDERS FOR MONDAY, JULY 21, 2008 -- (Senate - July 17, 2008)

[Page: S6946]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand in recess until 3 p.m., Monday, July 21; that following the prayer and the pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the time for the two leaders be reserved for their use later in the day, and the Senate resume consideration of the motion to proceed to S. 3268, the energy speculation bill.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
